title: 3 and Out - Refs Ruin MNF; Shanahan Dominates McVay; Chargers' L.A. Disaster; Cowboys/Eagles Preview; Baker's Bad Again
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Refs Ruin MNF; Shanahan Dominates McVay; Chargers' L.A. Disaster; Cowboys/Eagles Preview; Baker's Bad Again
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff examines the refs ruining MNF with some egregious calls against the Lions, how Kyle Shanahan dominated Sean McVay, why L.A. has been a disaster for the Chargers, his early take on the big Eagles/Cowboys Week 7 matchup, and his thoughts on another terrible Baker Mayfield performance against the Seahawks. He also gives some quick takes on Week 6 from around the league, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
